summary: The diff implements all six requirements with high fidelity. Backend unlockBadge/getUnlockedBadges functions are added, all 13 badges are defined in badges.ts, badge unlock logic is present in useBadgeUnlockLogic.ts and QuizResultPage.tsx, ProfilePage.tsx shows a badges section with BadgeCard, toast notifications appear via BadgeUnlockToast, and useQueries.ts adds both hooks. Minor gaps include: clan loyalty majority-of-answers logic is not implemented, and quiz trait scores are derived from saved profile data rather than actual quiz answers.

missing_requirements.requirement: Clan loyalty badges must be unlockable based on the majority of quiz answers belonging to a clan, not just the matched clan ID
missing_requirements.reason: The useBadgeUnlockLogic hook only checks result.matchedClanId to unlock clan badges. There is no majority-of-answers logic. The QuizResultPage builds traitScores from the saved matchedClanId rather than actual quiz answer data.

hallucinated_features.description: backend/migration.mo â€” a separate migration module file was added to handle data type migration from array to List for unlockedBadges
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request did not request a migration module. This is an implementation detail not specified in any requirement.

hallucinated_features.description: BadgeCard supports a configurable size prop with sm and md variants
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request only required displaying badge icon, name, and tagline with locked/unlocked states. A configurable size prop was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: BadgeUnlockToast supports staggered entrance delays by index position, delaying each toast by 200ms per index
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request specified toast notifications for each newly unlocked badge but did not specify staggered entrance delays by index.

hallucinated_features.description: useUnlockBadge also invalidates the currentUserProfile query on success in addition to the unlockedBadges query
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-6 only specified that useUnlockBadge should invalidate the unlocked badges query on success. Invalidating currentUserProfile was not requested.
